name: Tag contact in KlickTipp when receiving "STOP" message via Whatsapp
description:
This scenario listens to messages sent to your WhatsApp Business Account and tags the contact in KlickTipp in case of an opt out by messaging "stop". In other cases an auto responder is sent via a message template.
